lines.text:
[to his girlfriend about his job offering in St. Paul]
Julie, I want you to marry me, and move back to St. Paul with me.

Oh, Raymond, I have responsibilities. My job, and Laura. I have hard enough time coping with her as it is now. Can you imagine what she do if I told her I was gonna drag her off to St. Paul? She'll probably run off and join some drugged out religious sect or something. Or worse yet, go back to her father. I just don't know.
